import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function AddNote() { let navigate = useNavigate() const[note, setNote]=useState({ date:"", task:"", status:"" }) const{date,task,status}=note const onInputChange=(e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } const onSubmit=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/note",note) navigate("/") } return (
